name: mixs_compliance
description: Tests MIxS (Minimum Information about any Sequence) standard compliance
notes: S001 is compliant - all fields correct with proper ENVO terms
S002 has non-ISO date format, free-text instead of ENVO terms
S003 has 'missing' for lat_lon (acceptable), empty samp_collect_device
S003 has wrong ENVO terms (forest/tree/soil for human-gut package)
S004 has 'not applicable' for date - may be acceptable for clinical samples
S005 uses free-text ENVO descriptions instead of proper ENVO IDs
organism: should be proper metagenome term from NCBI taxonomy
